title: Japanese mega banks to jointly issue yen-pegged stablecoins: Report
contentSnippet: Japan’s top banks plan to launch a joint yen-based stablecoin using MUFG’s Progmat platform to modernize payments and corporate settlements.

title: How to catch market manipulation in altcoins before they crash
contentSnippet: Crypto market manipulation involves organized efforts to artificially move altcoin prices and mislead traders about their true value.

title: Crypto Markets Today: BTC, Altcoins Plunge as Liquidity Tightens and Gold Demand Soars
contentSnippet: Bitcoin drops below its 200-day average to near $104,500 amid broad sell-off; $1.2B in liquidations signal mounting stress as traders brace for further downside.

title: Ethereum-Based Uniswap Adds Solana Support in Win for Tackling DeFi Fragmentation
contentSnippet: This could simplify the user experience,  removing the need to use complex bridges or switch between different wallets and applications

title: Credit Market's 'Cockroach' Problem Hits BTC as $1.2B Gets Liquidated: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 17, 2025

title: Citizens Sees Ether Primed for $10K as Supply Tightens and Institutional Demand Surges
contentSnippet: The bank sees growing adoption, tighter supply and rising institutional inflows driving a sharp ether rally within two years.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF Records Highest Outflows Since August
contentSnippet: Analysts cited fallout from tariffs and last week's $19B liquidation event as driving institutional investors to defensive positioning.

title: France turns up heat on Binance and rivals amid EU power struggle
contentSnippet: French regulator ACPR is auditing Binance and other exchanges as Paris seeks a greater role in enforcing MiCA rules across Europe.

title: Gold Tests Key Resistance Level That Could Signal the Next Bullish Phase
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is now just 7% of gold’s total market value as it nears a $2 trillion market cap.

title: Bitcoin Hits Most Oversold Level Against Gold in 3 Years as BTC Risks Falling Below $100K
contentSnippet: The BTC/Gold ratio looks most oversold since November 2022, according to the RSI indicator.

title: Top five Ethereum block explorers for tracking transactions in 2025
contentSnippet: The best Ethereum block explorers in 2025, from Etherscan to TokenView, each offer unique tools, strengths and limitations.

title: Bitcoin's Plunge Below $105,000 Sends Crypto Market Cap to Lowest Level Since July
contentSnippet: Analysts argue that crypto's "bullish structure" remains intact, despite a sell-off driven by fears in the traditional banking sector.

title: 3メガバンク、円建てステーブルコインを共同発行へ　導入第一弾は三菱商事＝報道
contentSnippet: 三菱UFJ、三井住友、みずほの3メガバンクが円建てステーブルコインを共同発行。信託型により高い安全性を実現し、クロスボーダー送金のコスト削減を目指す。プログマのシステムを活用し今年度内に実用化予定。

title: Privacy laws hinder cross-border crypto regulation: G20 risk watchdog
contentSnippet: Sixteen years after Bitcoin’s debut, regulators continue to face hurdles in accessing reliable crypto data, with privacy laws complicating efforts.

title: How low will Bitcoin go? Regional US ‘bank stress’ pushes BTC toward $100K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin plunged to $104,500 in the spot market as signs of credit strain in US regional banks reignited fears of a broader market sell-off.

title: Record Surplus in September Highlights U.S. Fiscal Momentum as Bitcoin Struggles
contentSnippet: While bitcoin hovers near $105,000, stronger government revenues and a record September surplus point to improving fiscal conditions.

title: Salesforce Faces Class Action Over Alleged Illegal AI Training Data
contentSnippet: The authors claim the company trained its XGen models on nearly 200,000 pirated books, then scrubbed public disclosures.

title: ファンプラのIEO参加方法と注目ポイント｜コインチェックの実績、申込前に知るべき情報まとめ
contentSnippet: 音楽ファンクラブ運営大手Fanplusと協業するFanplaは14日、暗号資産「Fanpla（FPL）」のIEO（InitialExchangeOffering）をコインチェックで実施すると発表した。購入申し込みは10月21日に開始され、1...

title: Bitcoin Loses $106K as Bullish Crypto Bets Rack up $800M in Liquidations
contentSnippet: Bitcoin accounted for roughly $344 million in losses, followed by Ether at $201 million, and Solana (SOL) at $97 million.

title: Bitcoin hits 15-week low under $105K as US regional bank woes echo 2023
contentSnippet: Bitcoin price strength collapsed as US regional bank stress spilled over into crypto as it did in 2023, while traders focused on $100,000.

title: メタプラネット、ビットコイン複利モデルで反転狙う　サイモンCEOが方針説明
contentSnippet: メタプラネット株が400円台まで下落しmNAVは0.89に。サイモンCEOは「優先株で希薄化せずBTCを買い増す」方針を再確認。複利モデルの理論と背景を解説。

title: Bitcoin Drops Below $107K, XRP, ADA Down 17% on Week as Traders Await Risk-Taking Mode
contentSnippet: The tone in risk markets soured again overnight as traders rotated back to stablecoins, avoiding bitcoin and smaller tokens ahead of key Federal Reserve and geopolitical catalysts.

title: Bitcoin Slips Below 200-day SMA as 10-Year Treasury Yield Hits Lowest Since April
contentSnippet: Futures tied to the S&P 500 continue to signal risk-off, bolstering haven demand for bonds.

title: Uniswap adds Solana support on web app in $140B opportunity
contentSnippet: Decentralized exchange Uniswap has integrated with Jupiter’s Ultra API, making over a million Solana tokens available on its web app.

title: Ripple seeks to buy $1 billion XRP tokens for new treasury: Report
contentSnippet: Ripple Labs is already a significant XRP holder, with its market report from earlier this year revealing it had 4.5 billion tokens in its stash, with another 37 billion locked in escrow.

title: Binance Cleared to Acquire Korean Crypto Exchange GOPAX
contentSnippet: South Korea has approved Binance’s acquisition of GOPAX, ending a two-year review and clearing the exchange to re-enter the Korean market.

title: コインベース、ステーブルコイン決済プラットフォームを開始　USDC保有で年利4.1%
contentSnippet: コインベースが企業向けステーブルコイン決済プラットフォーム「Coinbase Business」を発表。USDC保有で年利4.1%、低手数料・即時決済でB2B決済の課題を解決。会計ソフト連携も対応。

title: ユニスワップがソラナ対応開始、非EVMチェーン初の統合実現
contentSnippet: ユニスワップが非EVMネットワークとして初めてソラナに対応し、ウェブアプリでSOLトークンの直接スワップが可能になった。100万以上のトークンにアクセスでき、今後はブリッジングやクロスチェーン機能も予定している。

title: Bitcoin Falls as Short Sellers Pile In, Even as Spot Buyers Step Up
contentSnippet: Analysts see continued volatility for Bitcoin as short sellers dominate derivatives while spot buyers provide fragile support.

title: ビットコイン価格モメンタム弱まるも、クジラの買いは堅調＝CryptoQuant
contentSnippet: CryptoQuantが仮想通貨ビットコイン市場の近況を分析。短期的な上昇の勢いが弱化しているがデータは大口投資家の買い増しを示唆していると指摘。上昇再開の水準などを分析した。

title: ビットコイン11万ドルを割り込み続落、米中首脳会談控え市場の緊張高まる
contentSnippet: ビットコインは前日比2.39%安の108,800ドルに下落。トランプ大統領が中国との貿易戦争継続を認め、月内の米中首脳会談を控える中で市場に緊張感が広がっている。VIX指数は5カ月ぶり高水準に急騰し、地銀の融資問題も重なり市場心理が悪化。一方で金価格高騰を背景にトークン化された金の時価総額が34億ドルに達するなど、リスク回避の動きが鮮明となっている。

title: 米上場Zeta、ビットコイン決済で約350億円私募調達　SolvBTCトークン採用
contentSnippet: 米上場ZetaがBTC決済で2.3億ドル私募。SolvBTC採用により、ビットコインを受動的保有から利回り創出型の生産的資産へ転換する財務戦略となる。

title: リップル、XRPトレジャリー設立で1500億円資金調達を主導
contentSnippet: リップルがXRPトレジャリーのため10億ドル規模の資金調達を主導していることが明らかになった。SPAC経由で資金を調達し、XRPに特化した最大級のデジタル資産保有企業を設立する計画だ。

title: 仮想通貨IEO投資の稼ぎ方　成功事例一覧と今後の予定、参加方法とは｜2025年版
contentSnippet: 暗号資産（仮想通貨）投資で公募価格の数倍もの高値付けることもある国内外のIEO事例ですが、初値で公募割れしたケースもあるなどリスクも付き物です。今後の注目IEOにはナナメウエ社の「YAY」、NOT A HOTELの「NAC」をbitFlyerやGMOコインが販売検討しており、口座開設がおすすめです。国内外のIEO成功事例、参加方法まで解説。

title: How Japan’s Crypto Insider Trading Ban Could Reshape Global Policy
contentSnippet: Tokyo’s legislative-first model creates a gravitational pull across Asia and beyond in a bid to clamp down on insider trading, observers say.

title: Nasdaq-Listed Zeta Network Raises $231M via Bitcoin-Backed Private Placement
contentSnippet: Zeta's private placement funded in Bitcoin or SolvBTC, a wrapped Bitcoin token, is being touted as a means to strengthen its balance sheet.

title: Newsmax Reveals Bitcoin, Trump Meme Coin Treasury
contentSnippet: Publicly traded media outlet Newsmax is building a digital assets treasury centered on Bitcoin and the president's official meme coin.

title: Moon or Doom: Does Bitcoin Hit $100K or $120K Next?
contentSnippet: As Bitcoin hovers around $108K, prediction markets flip bearish while short-term indicators confirm what bulls don't want to hear.

title: Why Is Dogecoin Down So Much Worse Than Bitcoin and Ethereum?
contentSnippet: Dogecoin remains the biggest loser among major crypto coins this week, shedding nearly a quarter of its value. Why's it down so bad?
